title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 49.5 - Changes in approval requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 49.5 - Changes in approval requirements

State Regulations

The Commissioner of Motor Vehicles, in his discretion, reserves the right to alter or change the requirements or specifications or to
require additional or supplementary tests at any time. The commissioner further
reserves the right to require the manufacturer to submit laboratory reports on
verification tests on samples selected by the commissioner from manufacturer's
or distributor's stock. If any such report discloses any unwarranted deviation
in material, design, construction or performance, the commissioner may revoke
the approval. Approval may be withdrawn at any time and for any cause deemed
reasonable by the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
49.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
